about.title: About me
about.paragraph1: Hi! I'm Jorge, a software engineer from Paraguay who loves turning technical constraints into creative solutions.
about.paragraph2: Over the past 12+ years, I've built everything from SMS systems serving 100,000 users to Flutter apps for financial institutions.
about.paragraph3: I'm always looking for simple solutions to complex problems.
about.paragraph4: Currently, I'm diving deep into modern frontend development with React and TypeScript at {company}.
about.paragraph5: When I'm not coding, you might find me exploring graphic design, tinkering with new technologies, or building a new mechanical keyboard.
about.paragraph6: I believe the best solutions come from understanding both the technical and business sides of a challenge.

frontend.title: Frontend
frontend.description: Building responsive web applications with React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. Focused on performance and experience.

backend.title: Backend
backend.description: APIs that scale from 1K to 100K users. Database optimizations and RESTful APIs. I work with databases and implement business logic with various frameworks and languages.

mobile.title: Mobile
mobile.description: I develop cross-platform mobile apps with Flutter, delivering consistent experiences, with a single codebase, for both iOS and Android.

items: Developed multi-region WebRTC connection quality monitoring tool using AWS CDK (TypeScript) and containerized services (Docker/ECS), reducing support cases by 20%.
Built React-based marketing tools and help center features with a custom renderer using Go Templates (gotmpl).
Maintained and expanded Toky Phone JavaScript SDK, inherited the project after a team member transition, and ensured continuity of client integrations.
Write and maintain tests using Vitest and Playwright for E2E testing.
Utilized Datadog for application monitoring and performance optimization across distributed services.
Enhanced the Toky iOS and Android mobile applications, fixing bugs and improving stability.

keyAchievement.title: SMS Premium System Optimization
items: Scaled subscriber base from 1,000 to 100,000 users through system optimization.
Increased SMS throughput from 100 messages/minute to 600 messages/45 seconds through PostgreSQL query optimization using EXPLAIN ANALYZE and strategic indexing.
Designed a custom buffer/queue system with a templating engine for personalized messages, processing delivery reports separately to maintain system performance.
Implemented retry logic with three execution windows (morning, noon, afternoon) for maximum delivery success.

sections.title: Banking & Financial Services Development
items: Developed RESTful API using Spring Boot/Hibernate for a banking platform with stringent security requirements.
Integrated PostgreSQL database with REST endpoints to create a robust service layer for transaction processing.
Built and deployed 4 Flutter mobile applications for financial institutions, each achieving 5,000-10,000 downloads per platform (iOS/Android).

sections.title: Geospatial & Distribution Systems

Implemented location-based features and territory management capabilities.
Provided mentorship and knowledge sharing across multiple development teams throughout tenure.

Developed a web application for dynamically generating eight different types of Facebook fan page applications with automatic installation, configuration management, user administration, and reporting capabilities.
